select count(*)
SELECT distinct ED.DEP_ID, ED.DEP_NAME
,'ENRO' type
,'DEPT' type
,'DEPT' type
FROM EMST_DEPARTMENT ED WHERE DEP_NAME like {depName}
AND ED.DEP_ID in (select eo.eof_id from emst_enrollment_office eo where eo.eof_id = ed.dep_id
and eo.eof_type in ({type})
and eo.eof_id in (select eo2.eof_superior_office from emst_enrollment_office eo2 where eo2.eof_id = {officeId})
and eo.eof_id not in ({officeId})
)
and ed.dep_parent_dep_id = {superDepartmentID}
AND ED.DEP_ID not in (select eo.eof_id from emst_enrollment_office eo)

select count(*)
SELECT distinct p.per_id, p.per_first_name || ' ' || p.per_last_name || ' (' || p.per_nid || ')' per_name, 'PER' per_type, p.per_phone, p.per_mobile_phone
FROM emst_person p WHERE p.per_userid is not null and ( (p.per_first_name || ' ' || p.per_last_name) like {perName} or p.per_nid like {perNID} )

select count(*)
SELECT distinct r.rat_id, r.rat_class, 'RATE' rat_type
FROM emst_rating_info r WHERE 1=1
AND r.rat_class like {clsName}

select count(*)
SELECT distinct p.per_id, p.per_first_name || ' ' || p.per_last_name || ' (' || p.per_nid || ')' per_name, 'PER' per_type
FROM emst_person p WHERE p.per_userid is not null and ( (p.per_first_name || ' ' || p.per_last_name) like {perName} ) and p.PER_DEP_ID IN (SELECT ED.DEP_ID FROM EMST_DEPARTMENT ED WHERE ED.DEP_LOCATION_ID in (select lo.LOC_ID from EMST_LOCATION lo where lo.LOC_PROVINCE_ID in ({locationId})))

select count(*)
SELECT distinct ED.DEP_ID, ED.DEP_NAME, LO.LOC_ID, LO.LOC_PROVINCE_ID
FROM EMST_DEPARTMENT ED,EMST_LOCATION LO WHERE DEP_NAME like {depName}
AND ED.DEP_ID not in (select eo.eof_id from emst_enrollment_office eo)
AND ED.DEP_ID in (select eo.eof_id from emst_enrollment_office eo WHERE eo.eof_type in ('NOCR')) AND ed.dep_parent_dep_id = {nocrId}
AND ED.DEP_ID in (select eo.eof_id from emst_enrollment_office eo WHERE eo.eof_type in ('OFFICE') AND eo.EOF_SUPERIOR_OFFICE in ({nocrId}))
AND ED.DEP_LOCATION_ID = LO.LOC_ID AND LO.LOC_PROVINCE_ID in ({location})
